website_summaries.verdict: Hush Puppies is known for creating and delivering quality shoes for men and women, and the low-top Hanston Roadside is among them. Great for everyday use, this shoe is what you can wear from day to night. It offers style and versatility without compromising comfort.From a dress-up to a casual look, the Hush Puppies Hanston Roadside is among the men’s favorite pair. With a fashion-forward silhouette, it truly has an eye-catching appeal that solicits praise from others.
pros: Most customers expressed their admirations on the fashionable and neat style of the Hush Puppies Hanston Roadside
It is among the Hush Puppies sneakers that offer great comfort, according to a significant number of users
This leather-textured sneaker makes a perfect match for both casual and business attire, noted by many reviewers
Several buyers testified that it has excellent quality
This shoe fits like a glove, mentioned by many
A couple of wearers said that the low-top Hanston Roadside is lightweight
It has shoe sizes that can accommodate people with wide feet, noted by some
A few said that they receive compliments whenever they wear it
cons: Those with average sized feet thought that the regular width shoes felt bigger than expected
While the low-top Hush Puppies Hanston Roadside is available in wide width, several wide-footed individuals said that these still fit a bit snug
A couple of users perceived that this shoe lacks cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Husband had narrower feet and these fit him comfortably. He's a pronator and the arch support is sufficient. He typically wears a size 12, but based on others' reviews, I ordered the size 11.5 for him and it fits well. Love the style, looks nice with jeans, gives him a more updated look (within his comfort zone lol) - better than traditional running shoes that he'd typically wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: Lack of cushioning and arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I may not be a fair judge about these sneakers because I have really flat feet. I am 6'3" and weigh 240 lbs. When these arrived I was pleased with the quality and appearance of the shoe however, when I put them on and walked around the house a bit, the lack of cushioning and sole support was disappointing. The overall size was fine and as expected. I hesitate to recommend these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will say they are extremely comfortable right out of the box but don't last worth ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in September.... it's now December and the sole is separating on one shoe. I will say they are extremely comfortable right out of the box but don't last worth beans. Not even used for work shoes, only worn out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Efandahl

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in these a bit
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in these a bit. They're a good looking shoe, but my husband said they were a snug fit and not very comfortable. He also said they were narrow and he really doesn't have that big of a foot. It's hard buying shoes online! :/
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Just fit enough
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit me well but I feel a little hard for what I expected. But they are pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Leather
customer_reviews.text: HushPuppies is known for making quality shoes, so that's what I expected, and I am happy to report these are some pretty great shoes. The leather used for the uppers is thick and good quality and I like the texture...not suede, but a soft matte finish. The soles seem durable too. Update: It's now going on 2 years of almost everyday use and these shoes are still going strong, other than the inside heel fabric wearing out....which is a bit annoying, but overall they've been well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelman Merchandise

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. It's always tough finding shoes for him since he has such a wide foot but and the shoes he buys always hurt him, but he says these are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DeuxEpees

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten a few compliments on these shoes. You ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a few compliments on these shoes. You don't see many leather sneakers these days so I guess they stand out. The leather is high quality. It is very soft and durable. They run a little big so beware. I should've bought a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Made for elves feet
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these shoes except the shape. I'm pretty sure they used elves' feet to design these shoes. The shoes as very long and narrow. I bought the "wide" version and they are still very skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Mattop

customer_reviews.title: We like the shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great. I bought them for my husband. He wears a size 8 in Vanns, but these size 8's were too large for him, about 1/2 longer than the Vanns. If you can get the sizing right, you'll have a nice pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected I need a wide shoes and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Dechert

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking pair, feels small and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great feels horrible and small, not a comfortable fit at all. Hush Puppies aren't what they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: David Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Slick kicks
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Perfect for the office or shorts and a tee. Ordered on whole size smaller than my Nike or Asics. Comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous casual leather sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. So happy they are available in wide. Leather is nice and the orange accent stiching give them an updated look.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have giant wide skis for feet and these shoes fit perfectly. Comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine331

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe that can dress up or keep casual. The fit was excellent and there is decent support in the arch.
customer_reviews.author: OwlCapone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Second pair, great shoe, comfortable and an excellent fit. After a year some threads on the first pair came loose but it looks like any easy shoe repair.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppy can (and has in the past) do better.
customer_reviews.text: The ad shows these coming in 2E width. When they arrive they are noted as W width. In this case, W is nowhere near the same as 2E. The W width in this shoe is really the same as most other reputable shoe company's C/D, not 2E. Hush Puppy can (and has in the past) do better.
customer_reviews.author: Finith Jernigan II

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: my uncle love this shoes and was pleased to get them,it is exactly what he wants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were extremely irregular. Left shoe differed from right ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were extremely irregular. Left shoe differed from right significantly both in width and look. Quality control is lacking
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Haaaappy Day
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, nice price...goes great with new shorts (British Khaki)
customer_reviews.author: Jack G Hardy

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and look nice. I often have trouble with sneakers being not ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected and look nice. I often have trouble with sneakers being not wide enough but these are my second pair of Hush Puppies and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: UncleHankins

customer_reviews.title: great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I would say a bit narrow fit, great looking shoes
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a step up from the typical tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: dskingsley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were rated as wide width and they were not.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Inglehart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fit (wide fit was perfect) and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MDavid

customer_reviews.title: The plastic stuff supporting the heels was broken after one ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic stuff supporting the heels was broken after one week using the shoes. Now the plastic is hurting my left foot. Definitely a very fragile shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice but run Small
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes for my brother their to narrow He likes but they wearing blisters on the heels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: returned this item because it was a small fit
customer_reviews.text: returned this item because it was a small fit, i wear a 9.5 wide 3-4e, i thought this would be a good fit but it was just small.
customer_reviews.author: S. Faria

customer_reviews.title: Finally, NICE wide shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Width is PERFECT. Finally nice shoes that are made in a wide. Little room in the toes, but these shoes are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: men hanston roadside leather
product_meta.description: The Hanston Roadside is a refined leather sneaker you can take from work day to date night. HPO2Flex construction provides a flexible fit, and you'll appreciate how versatile it is within your wardrobe.
feature_bullets: HPO2Flex: Cushioned triangle footbed pattern conforms to the way you walk, providing air circulation, flexibility and superior support
Distressed trim linings and unlined forepart; Strobel construction
HPO2Flex footbed with Ethylene vinyl acetate heel cup provides exceptional cushioning and comfort
Cupsole outsole with sawtooth tread design element
